id: HealthCare.gov system hack leaves 75,000 individuals exposed
paragraph: By Amanda GoldenUpdated 3:22 PM ET, Sat October 20, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)A hack was detected earlier this month in a government computer system that works alongside HealthCare.gov, exposing the personal information of approximately 75,000 people, according to the agency in charge of the portal.
